name: Bubble Barrage
description:
Bubble Barrage is a game jam game made with the theme gummy. I met two of my best friends working on this game, CJ Legato: https://treejayz.itch.io/ and Axel Stewart: https://axel-stewart.itch.io/. In this game, you play as Brian the gummy worm while you defend yourself with your bubbles from the endless hordes of angry gummy bears. I programmed, CJ did all the art, Axel made the audio, CJ provided his voice for the fire noise and gummy bears. We came in first at the Game Jam, and I still have the bath toy I won!

Controls:

A & D keys: Move left and right

W key: Jump

Spacebar: fire bubble gum bubble

Escape: back to menu
